nodes.text: A droid repair technician was active during the war between the First Order and the Resistance. After being attacked by the Guavian death gang on Mubo and J-4X's cargo transport, the droid repair technician crash-landed onto the planet Batuu in an escape pod that was nearly destroyed by the leader of this Guavian cell, Tara Rashin. On the planet the repair technician goes to Seezelslaks cantina where he meets up with Mubo. The repair technician gets the job of getting the cargo back before the Guavians do. After completeing this he find C-3PO who was maimed by monkey-lizards. After they both get back to Mubos shop, where 3PO stays and also Mubo tells the repair technician that he'd been replaced. The repair technician still works with 3PO to find R2-D2 though and fixes up 3PO. They both go through the Batuu wilds once more to Tara's Guavian tower and they find R2. Tara then comes out and battles the repair technician, but in the end is defeated by R2-D2 by pushing heavy contaners at Taras custom AT-RTs legs, tripping it and making Tara fall to her death.

After the battle for the cargo and against the guavians, the repair technician still stopped by to see Mubo, C-3PO and R2-D2 and all of his micro droids he had collected. He spent most of his time with Seezelslak at his cantina, becoming his hunter in the wilds for supplies for his cantina. The repair technician got free drinks from this and was told the story of Ady Sun'Zee and the dark temple.
The technician serves as the player-controlled character of the virtual reality experience Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy's Edge.
